company.name: ProCraft Contractors

hero.title: Expert Contractors You Can Trust
hero.subtitle: From kitchen remodels to complete home renovations, we deliver quality craftsmanship with over 10 years of experience. Licensed, insured, and guaranteed.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive contracting services for residential and commercial projects

items.title: Kitchen Remodeling
items.description: Complete kitchen transformations with custom cabinets, countertops, and modern appliances.

items.title: Bathroom Renovations
items.description: Luxury bathroom makeovers from simple updates to complete spa-like retreats.

items.title: Home Additions
items.description: Expand your living space with professionally designed and built room additions.

items.title: Roofing & Siding
items.description: Protect your home with expert roofing and siding installation and repairs.

items.title: Deck & Patio Construction
items.description: Create outdoor living spaces with custom decks, patios, and outdoor kitchens.

items.title: Basement Finishing
items.description: Transform unused basement space into functional living areas.

projects.title: Our Recent Projects
projects.subtitle: Showcasing our craftsmanship and attention to detail

items.title: Modern Farmhouse Kitchen
items.description: Complete kitchen renovation featuring custom white cabinets, quartz countertops, and stainless steel appliances.

items.title: Luxury Master Bathroom
items.description: Spa-inspired master bathroom with marble tile, double vanity, and walk-in shower.

items.title: Two-Story Addition
items.description: Added 800 sq ft to this family home including a new master suite and family room.

items.description: Replaced 25-year-old roof with architectural shingles and new gutter system.

items.title: Outdoor Kitchen & Deck
items.description: Custom outdoor kitchen with built-in grill, refrigerator, and expansive deck space.

items.title: Basement Game Room
items.description: Finished basement transformed into entertainment space with wet bar and home theater.

why_choose_us.title: Why Choose ProCraft Contractors?
why_choose_us.subtitle: Over 10 years of experience delivering exceptional results
why_choose_us.alt: Professional contractor team working on a project

features.title: Licensed & Insured
features.description: Fully licensed contractors with comprehensive insurance coverage for your protection.

features.title: Quality Guarantee
features.description: We stand behind our work with comprehensive warranties on materials and craftsmanship.

features.title: Free Estimates
features.description: Detailed project proposals at no cost, helping you make informed decisions.

features.title: On-Time Completion
features.description: Respecting your schedule with reliable project timelines and clear communication.

features.title: Local Expertise
features.description: Deep knowledge of local building codes, materials, and contractor networks.

features.title: Customer Satisfaction
features.description: 98% customer satisfaction rate with hundreds of happy homeowners.

quote.title: Get Your Free Quote Today
quote.subtitle: Tell us about your project and we'll provide a detailed estimate within 24 hours

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.quote: ProCraft transformed our outdated kitchen into a modern masterpiece. Their attention to detail and professionalism was outstanding. The project was completed on time and within budget.

items.name: Mike Rodriguez
items.quote: We've used ProCraft for multiple rental property renovations. Their quality work and reliable scheduling make them our go-to contractors. Highly recommended!

items.name: Jennifer Chen
items.quote: The bathroom renovation exceeded our expectations. The team was clean, courteous, and the finished product is absolutely beautiful. Worth every penny!

footer.description: Professional contractors serving Springfield and surrounding areas with quality craftsmanship and exceptional service since 2010.

seo.meta_description: Professional contractors in Springfield, IL specializing in kitchen remodeling, bathroom renovations, home additions, roofing, and more. Licensed, insured, and guaranteed.
